mutants.code:
import heapq

def find_top_participant(n, q, events):
    MAX = 1000001
    SFT = 20
    Q = []
    tbl = [0] * (n + 1)
    results = []
    for event in events:
        (id, v) = event
        tbl[id] += v
        heapq.heappush(Q, (-tbl[id] << SFT | id, id, tbl[id]))
        while True:
            (f, id, v) = Q[0]
            if tbl[id] == v:
                results.append((id, v))
                break
            heapq.heappop(Q)
    return results

def find_top_participant(n, q, events):
    MAX = 1000000
    SFT = 20
    Q = []
    tbl = [0] * (n + 1)
    results = []
    for event in events:
        (id, v) = event
        tbl[id] -= v
        heapq.heappush(Q, (-tbl[id] << SFT | id, id, tbl[id]))
        while True:
            (f, id, v) = Q[0]
            if tbl[id] == v:
                results.append((id, v))
                break
            heapq.heappop(Q)
    return results

import heapq

def find_top_participant(n, q, events):
    MAX = 1000000
    SFT = 20
    Q = []
    tbl = [0] * (n + 1)
    results = []
    for event in events:
        (id, v) = event
        tbl[id] += v
        heapq.heappush(Q, (+tbl[id] << SFT | id, id, tbl[id]))
        while True:
            (f, id, v) = Q[0]
            if tbl[id] == v:
                results.append((id, v))
                break
            heapq.heappop(Q)
    return results
